name: NekoBop
synopsis: There are Pesky Cat-girls invading your Café, looking for the tastiest Ice Cream in town. They are relentless, and will stop at nothing to eat up all your freshly baked goods, and Ice-cream supply! To counter this, Behold… the Neko Hammer. You can lightly bop the Cat-girls on the head with it to repel them away from your tasty treats! But can you get rid of them all before they take over your café? Find out now by Playing “NekoBop”!
